content:
Sure, here are a few affordable meal delivery services that seniors can use during the COVID-19 pandemic:

1. Meals on Wheels - This nonprofit organization delivers hot meals to seniors in need, often for free or low cost.

2. Silver Cuisine by BistroMD - This meal delivery service offers healthy and fully prepared meals for seniors, with options for dietary restrictions and preferences.

3. Freshly - This delivery service offers fresh, chef-cooked meals that can be heated up in minutes, with no cooking or cleaning required.

4. Nutrisystem - This meal delivery service offers a variety of pre-packaged meals that are designed to help seniors lose weight and maintain a healthy diet.

5. Mom's Meals - This meal delivery service offers a range of meals that are easy to prepare and can be customized for specific dietary needs.

It's important to note that availability and pricing may vary by location, so it may be helpful to research local options as well.
